snippet: The Mets have signed Andrew Brown, who batted .232 with 5 home runs in 46 games for the Colorado Rockies last season, to a minor league contract and invited him to spring training.
abstract: The Mets have signed Andrew Brown, who batted .232 with 5 home runs in 46 games for the Colorado Rockies last season, to a minor league contract and invited him to spring training.

headline.main: Mets Sign Outfielder to Minor League Deal
